name: Leadfoot
description:
Brakes? What brakes? The only way to race is foot DOWN!

Controls: A/D to turn left/right

(The only way to slow down is to crash or drive on grass)

(IMPORTANT: it looks like I screwed up my last submission when I tried to include the mac build. Go into the WindowBuild folder and play from there. There's no mac build)

(Sorry, the web build is really messed up so it's just the downloadables)

Music Credits:

Welcome to the Show by Kevin MacLeod
